GR14yamsr_pu:3: nāthāya nāthamunaye 'tra paratra cāpi nityaṃ yadīyacaraṇau śaraṇaṃ madīyam || YStr_2 ||
GR14yamsr_pu:7: saṃdarśayan niramimīta purāṇaratnaṃ tasmai namo munivirāya parāśarāya || YStr_4 ||
GR14yamsr_pu:8: mātā pitā yuvatayas tanayā vibhūtiḥ sarvaṃ yad eva niyamena madanvayānām |
GR14yamsr_pu:9: ādyasya naḥ kulapater vakulābhirāmaṃ śrīmat tadaṅghriyugalaṃ praṇamāmi mūrdhnā || YStr_5 ||
GR14yamsr_pu:10: yan mūrdhni me śrutiśirassu ca bhāti yasminn asmanmanorathapathaḥ sakalaḥ sameti |
GR14yamsr_pu:11: stoṣyāmi naḥ kuladhanaṃ kuladaivataṃ tat pādāravindam aravindavilocanasya || YStr_6 ||
GR14yamsr_pu:12: tattvena yasya mahimārṇavaśīkarāṇuḥ śakyo na mātum api śarvapitāmahādyaiḥ |
GR14yamsr_pu:13: kartuṃ tadīyamahimastutim udyatāya mahyaṃ namo 'stu kavaye nirapatrapāya || YStr_7 ||
GR14yamsr_pu:14: yad vā śramāvadhi yathāmati vāpy aśaktaḥ staumy evam eva khalu te 'pi sadā stuvantaḥ |
GR14yamsr_pu:15: vedāś catur mukhamukhāś ca; mahārṇavāntaḥ ko majjator aṇukulācalayor viśeṣaḥ ? || YStr_8 ||
GR14yamsr_pu:16: kiṃ caiṣa śaktyatiśayena na te 'nukampyaḥ stotāpi tu stutikṛtena pariśrameṇa |
GR14yamsr_pu:17: tatra śramas tu sulabho mama mandabuddher ity udyamo 'yam ucito mama cābjanetra ! || YStr_9 ||
GR14yamsr_pu:18: nāvekṣase tyadi tato bhuvanāny amūni nālaṃ prabho bhavitum eva kutaḥ pravṛttiḥ ? |
GR14yamsr_pu:19: evaṃ nisargasuhṛdi tvayi sarvajantâüḥ svāmin ! citram idam āśritavatsalatvam || YStr_10 ||
GR14yamsr_pu:20: svābhāvikānavadhikātiśayeśitṛtvaṃ nārāyaṇa ! tvayi na mṛṣyati vaidikaḥ kaḥ ? |
GR14yamsr_pu:21: brahmā śivaḥ śatamakhaḥ paramasvarāḍ ity ete 'pi yasya mahimārṇavavipraṣas te || YStr_11 ||
GR14yamsr_pu:22: kaś śrīḥ śriyaḥ ? paramasattvasamāśrayaḥ kaḥ ? kaḥ puṇḍarīkanayanaḥ ? puruṣottamaḥ kaḥ ? |
GR14yamsr_pu:25: ko 'nyaḥ prajāpaśupatī paripāti ? kasya pādodakena sa śivaḥ svaśirodhṛtena ? || YStr_13 ||
GR14yamsr_pu:26: kasyodare haraviriñcamukhaḥ prapañcaḥ ? ko rakṣatīmam ? ajaniṣṭa ca kasya nābheḥ ? |
GR14yamsr_pu:27: krāntvā nigīrya punar udgirati tvadanyaḥ kaḥ ? kena vaiṣa paravān iti śakyaśaṅkaḥ ? || YStr_14 ||
GR14yamsr_pu:28: tvāṃ śīlarūpacaritaiḥ paramaprakṛṣṭasattvena sāttvikatayā prabalaiś ca śāstraiḥ |
GR14yamsr_pu:29: prakhyātadaivaparamārthavidāṃ mataiś ca naivāsuraprakṛtayaḥ prabhavanti boddhum || YStr_15 ||
GR14yamsr_pu:31: māyābalena bhavatāpi niguhyamānaṃ paśyanti kecid aniśaṃ tvadananyabhāvāḥ || YStr_16 ||
GR14yamsr_pu:32: yad aṇḍam aṇḍāntaragocaraṃ ca yaddaśottarāṇy āvaraṇāni yāni ca |
GR14yamsr_pu:33: guṇāḥ pradhānaṃ puruṣaḥ paraṃ padaṃ parāt paraṃ brahma ca te vibhūtayaḥ || YStr_17 ||
GR14yamsr_pu:34: vaśī vadānyo guṇavān ṛjuḥ śucir mṛdur dayālur madhuraḥ sthiraḥ samaḥ |
GR14yamsr_pu:35: kṛtī kṛtajñas tvam api svabhāvataḥ samastakalyāṇaguṇāmṛtodadhiḥ || YStr_18 ||
GR14yamsr_pu:36: upary upary abjabhuvo 'pi pūruṣān prakalpya te ye śatam ity anukramāt |
GR14yamsr_pu:37: giras tvad ekaikaguṇāvdhīpsayā sadā sthitā nodyamato 'tiśerate || YStr_19 ||
GR14yamsr_pu:39: bhavanti līlāvidhayaś ca vaidikās tvadīyagambhīramano'nusāriṇaḥ || YStr_20 ||
GR14yamsr_pu:40: namo namo vāṅmanasātibhūmaye namo namo vāṅmanasaikabhūmaye |
GR14yamsr_pu:42: na dharmaniṣṭho 'smi, na cātmavedī, na bhaktimāṃs tvaccaraṇāravinde |
GR14yamsr_pu:43: akiñcano 'nanyagatiḥ śaraṇya ! tvatpādamūlaṃ śaraṇaṃ prapadye || YStr_22 ||
GR14yamsr_pu:44: na ninditaṃ karma tad asti loke sahasraśo yan na mayā vyadhāyi |
GR14yamsr_pu:45: so 'haṃ vipākāvasare mukunda ! krandāmi sampraty agatis tavāgre || YStr_23 ||
GR14yamsr_pu:46: nimajjato 'nanta ! bhavārṇavāntaś cirāya me kūlam ivāsi labdhaḥ |
GR14yamsr_pu:47: tvayāpi labdhaṃ bhagavann idānīm anuttamaṃ pātram idaṃ dayāyāḥ || YStr_24 ||
GR14yamsr_pu:48: abhūtapūrvaṃ mama bhāvi kiṃ vā sarvaṃ sahe me sahajaṃ hi duḥkham |
GR14yamsr_pu:49: kiṃ tu tvadagre śaraṇāgatānāṃ parābhavo nātha ! na te 'nurūpaḥ || YStr_25 ||
GR14yamsr_pu:50: nirāsakasyāpi na tāvad utsahe maheśa ! hātuṃ tava pādapaṅkajam |
GR14yamsr_pu:51: ruṣā nirasto 'pi śiśuḥ stanandhayo na jātu mātuś caraṇau jihāsati || YStr_26 ||
GR14yamsr_pu:52: tavāmṛtasyandini pādakaṅkaje niveśitātmā katham anyad icchati |
GR14yamsr_pu:53: sthite 'ravinde makarandanirbhare madhuvrato nekṣurakaṃ hi vīkṣate || YStr_27 ||
GR14yamsr_pu:54: tvadaṅghrim uddiśya kadāpi kenacid yathā tathā vāpi sakṛt kuto 'ñjaliḥ |
GR14yamsr_pu:55: tadaiva muṣṇāty aśubhāby aśeṣataḥ śubhāni puṣṇāti na jātu hīyate || YStr_28 ||
GR14yamsr_pu:56: udīrṇasaṃsāradavāśuśukṣaṇiṃ kṣaṇena nirvāpya parāṃ ca nirvṛtim |
GR14yamsr_pu:59: dhanaṃ madīyaṃ tava pādapaṅkajaṃ kadā nu sākṣātkaravāṇi cakṣuṣā ? || YStr_30 ||
GR14yamsr_pu:64: cakāsataṃ jyākiṇakarkaśaiḥ śubhaiś caturbhir ājānuvilambhir bhuhaiḥ |
GR14yamsr_pu:72: cakartha yasyā bhavanaṃ bhujāntaraṃ tava priyaṃ dhāma yadīyajanmabhūḥ |
GR14yamsr_pu:73: jagatsamastaṃ yadapāṅgasaṃśrayaṃ yadartham ambhodhir amanthy abandhi ca || YStr_37 ||
GR14yamsr_pu:75: guṇena rūpeṇa vilāsaceṣṭitais sadā tavaivocitayā tava śriyā || YStr_38 ||
GR14yamsr_pu:79: śarīrabhedais tava śeṣatāṃ gatair yathocitaṃ śṣa itīrite janaiḥ || YStr_40 ||
GR14yamsr_pu:80: dāsas sakhā vāhanam āsanaṃ dhvajo yas te vitānaṃ vyajanaṃ trayīmayaḥ |
GR14yamsr_pu:81: upasthitaṃ tena puro garutmatā tvadaṅghrisammardakiṇāṅkaśobhanā || YStr_41 ||
GR14yamsr_pu:83: priyeṇa senāpatinā nyavedi tattathānujānantam udāravīkṣanaiḥ || YStr_42 ||
GR14yamsr_pu:87: kṣaṇāṇuvat kṣiptaparādikālayā praharṣayantaṃ mahiṣīṃ mahābhujanam || YStr_44 ||
GR14yamsr_pu:89: śriyaḥ śriyaṃ bhaktajanaikajīvitaṃ samartham āpatsakham arthikalpakam || YStr_45 ||
GR14yamsr_pu:92: dhig aśucim avinītaṃ nirbhayaṃ mām alajjaṃ paramapuruṣa yo 'ham yogivaryāgragaṇyaiḥ |
GR14yamsr_pu:93: vidhśivasanakādyair dhyātum atyantadūraṃ tava parijanabhāvaṃ kāmaye kāmavṛttaḥ || YStr_47 ||
GR14yamsr_pu:95: atagiṃ śaraṇāgataṃ hare kṛpayā kevalam ātmasātkuru || YStr_48 ||
GR14yamsr_pu:97: bhagavan bhavadurdine pathaḥ skhalitaṃ mām avalokayāciyuta || YStr_49 ||
GR14yamsr_pu:98: na mṛṣā paramārtham eva me śṛnu vijñāpanam ekam agrataḥ |
GR14yamsr_pu:99: yadi me na dayiṣyase tato dayanīyas tava nātha durlabhaḥ || YStr_50 ||
GR14yamsr_pu:100: tad ahaṃ tvad ṛte na nāthavān mad ṛte tvaṃ dayanīyavān na ca |
GR14yamsr_pu:101: vidhinirmitam etam anvayaṃ bhagavān palaya mā sma jīhapaḥ || YStr_51 ||
GR14yamsr_pu:102: vapurādiṣu yo 'pi ko 'pi vā guṇato 'sāni yathātathāvidhaḥ |
GR14yamsr_pu:103: tad ayaṃ tava pādapadmayor aham adyaiva mayā samarpitaḥ || YStr_52 ||
GR14yamsr_pu:104: mama nātha yad asti yo 'smy ahaṃ sakalaṃ tad dhi tavaiva mādhava |
GR14yamsr_pu:105: niyatasvam iti prabuddhadhīr atha vā kiṃ nu samarpayāmi te || YStr_53 ||
GR14yamsr_pu:106: avabodhitavān imāṃ yathā mayi nityāṃ bhavadīyatāṃ svayam |
GR14yamsr_pu:107: kṛpayaivam ananyabhogyatāṃ bhagavan bhaktim api prayaccha me || YStr_54 ||
GR14yamsr_pu:108: tava dāsyasukhaikasaṅghināṃ bhavaneṣu astv api kīṭajanma me |
GR14yamsr_pu:109: itarāvasatheṣu mā sma bhūd api me janma caturmukhātmanā || YStr_55 ||
GR14yamsr_pu:111: mahātmabhir mām avalokyatāṃ naya kṣaṇe 'pi te yad viraho 'tidussahaḥ || YStr_56 ||
GR14yamsr_pu:112: na dehaṃ na prāṇān na ca sukham aśeṣābhilaṣitaṃ na cātmānaṃ nānyat ki api tava śeṣatvavibhavāt /
GR14yamsr_pu:113: bahirbhūtaṃ nātha kṣaṇam api sahe yātu śatadhā vināśaṃ tat satyaṃ madhumathana vijñāpanam idam || YStr_57 ||
GR14yamsr_pu:114: durantasyānāder apariharaṇīyasya mahato nihīnācāro 'haṃ nṛpaśur aśubhasyāspadam api /
GR14yamsr_pu:115: dayāsindho bandho niravadhikavātsalyajaladhe tava smāraṃ smāraṃ guṇagaṇam itīcchāmi gatabhīḥ || YStr_58 ||
GR14yamsr_pu:116: anicchann apy evaṃ yadi punar itīcchann iva rajastamaśchannac chadmastutivacanabhaṅgīṃ aracayam |
GR14yamsr_pu:117: tathāpītthaṃrūpaṃ vacanam avalambyāpi kṛpayā tvam evaivambhūtaṃ dharaṇidhara me śikṣaya manaḥ || YStr_59 ||
GR14yamsr_pu:118: pitā tvaṃ mātā tvaṃ dayitatanayas tvaṃ priyasuhṛt tvam eva tvaṃ mitram gurur asi gatiś cāsi jagatām |
GR14yamsr_pu:119: tvadīyas tvadhbṛtyas tava parijanas tvadgatir ahaṃ prapannaś caivaṃ saty aham api tavaivāsmi hi bharaḥ || YStr_60 ||
GR14yamsr_pu:120: janitvāhaṃ vaṃśe mahati jagati khyaatayaśasāṃ śucīnāṃ yuktānāṃ guṇapuruṣatattvasthitividām /
GR14yamsr_pu:121: nisargād eva tvaccaraṇakamalāikāntamanasām adho 'dhaḥ pāpātmā śaraṇada nimajjāmi tamasi || YStr_61 ||
GR14yamsr_pu:122: amaryādaḥ kṣudraś calamatir asūyaprasavabhūḥ kṛtaghno durmānī smaraparavaśo vañcanaparaḥ |
GR14yamsr_pu:123: nṛśaṃsaḥ pāpiṣṭhaḥ katham aham ito duḥkhajaladher apārād uttīrṇas tava paricareyaṃ caraṇayoḥ || YStr_62 ||
GR14yamsr_pu:124: raghuvara yad abhūs tvaṃ tādṛśo vāyasasya praṇata iti dayālur yac ca caidyasya kṛṣṇa |
GR14yamsr_pu:125: pratibhavam aparāddhur mugdha sāyujyado 'bhūr vada kim apadam āgas tasya te 'si kṣamāyāḥ || YStr_63 ||
GR14yamsr_pu:126: nanu prapannas sakṛd eva nātha tavāhaṃ asmīti ca yācamānaḥ |
GR14yamsr_pu:127: tavānukampyas smartaḥ pratijñānāṃ madekavarjaṃ kim idaṃ vrataṃ te || YStr_64 ||
